skills.label: Manage customer relationships
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create and maintain customer records in microsoft dynamics 365
Configure and manage customer trade agreements including agreements with supplementary items
Set up customer groups and posting profiles
Configure additional customer parameters including delivery and payment terms
Create a customer using default data and financial dimensions

skills.label: Manage vendor relationships
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create and maintain vendor records
Configure and manage vendor trade agreements
Set up vendor groups and posting profiles

skills.label: Control and manage sales
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create charge codes
Create auto charges on items, customers and vendors

skills.label: Manage sales commissions
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create commission customer groups

skills.label: Create sales quotations
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create sales quotations

skills.label: Perform the sales process
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create sales orders

skills.label: Configure delivery settings
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: set up enhanced delivery date control
Configure coverage calendars and transport times
Configure available ship and receipt dates

skills.label: Process outbound delivery and invoicing
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create direct delivery orders

skills.label: Control and manage purchases
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create charges codes

skills.label: Create purchase requisitions
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create and submit purchase requisitions for approval
Define control parameters and workflow on purchase requisition documents

skills.label: Create requests for quotations
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create requests for quotations
Accept or reject requests for quotations
Manage bills of materials on sales quotations

skills.label: Perform the procurement process
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create purchase orders
Create purchase agreements and release lines

skills.label: Receive products and services
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: perform desktop receiving
Create purchase invoices and match receipts
Set up quality management on purchase items
Create tests and configure item sampling
Configure automatic and manual quality orders
Create a case for undelivered products from a vendor

skills.label: Configure and manage item reservations
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: apply automatic and manual reservations

skills.label: Set up and configure inventory management
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create sites
Set up inventory aisles and locations

skills.label: Manage products and services
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create product and service records
Create item groups and item model groups
Track inventory using serial and batch numbers

skills.label: Enrich product data
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: set up product attributes

skills.label: Configure, run, and review inventory reports
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: configure abc classifications
Run and analyze inventory aging reports
